snippet: DORFMAN--Adeline, age 88, passed away on Wednesday, May 11, 2016. Adeline was a great mother, sister, aunt, mother-in-law, grandmother, great-grandmother and friend. She gave special love to all of us. Grave service will take place on Sunday, May 15, 2016 at 10am at Mount Lebanon Beth Israel Cemetery, 78-00 Myrtle Ave, Glendale, NY 11385. Contributions in her memory may be made to the Temple Emanuel, 150 Hicks Lane, Great Neck, NY 11024 to Rabbi's Discretionary Fund. 1/3
lead_paragraph: DORFMAN--Adeline, age 88, passed away on Wednesday, May 11, 2016. Adeline was a great mother, sister, aunt, mother-in-law, grandmother, great-grandmother and friend. She gave special love to all of us. Grave service will take place on Sunday, May 15, 2016 at 10am at Mount Lebanon Beth Israel Cemetery, 78-00 Myrtle Ave, Glendale, NY 11385. Contributions in her memory may be made to the Temple Emanuel, 150 Hicks Lane, Great Neck, NY 11024 to Rabbi's Discretionary Fund. 1/3
